summary: A TensorFlow custom layer that performs the pixel‑shuffle operation, rearranging channel data into spatial dimensions to upscale feature maps, mirroring the behavior of PyTorch’s nn.PixelShuffle.
business_intent: Enable TensorFlow models to use the efficient pixel‑shuffle upsampling technique for tasks such as super‑resolution, image generation, or any architecture that requires channel‑to‑spatial conversion, ensuring compatibility with PyTorch‑based designs.
